latex:
$\textbf{(Lucas Numbers)}$ The Lucas numbers are defined by $L_0 = 2$, $L_1 = 1$, and $L_{n+2} = L_{n+1} + L_n$ for every $n \ge 0$. There are $N$ integers $1 \le n \le 2016$ such that $L_n$ contains the digit $1$. Estimate $N$.\\
\\
An estimate of $E$ earns $\left\lfloor 20 - 2|N-E| \right\rfloor$ or $0$ points, whichever is greater.
